t: For the director of music. Of the Sons of Korah. A psalm.
Clap*pn your hands, all you nations; shout*ld to God with cries of joy.
For*pn the Lord*s Most High is awesome, the*ld great King over all the earth.
He*ln subdued nations under us, peoples*ld under our feet.
He*ln chose our inheritance for us, the*ld pride of Jacob, whom he loved.
God*pn has ascended amid shouts of joy, the*ld Lord*s amid the sounding of trumpets.
Sing*ln praises to God, sing praises; sing*ld praises to our King, sing praises.
For*ln God is the King of all the earth; sing*ld to him a psalm of praise.
God*pn reigns over the nations; God*ld is seated on his holy throne.
The*ln nobles of the nations assemble as*ld the people of the God of Abraham, for*ln the kings of the earth belong to God; he*ld is greatly exalted.
